name: ACRobot Script
summary: Learn about .ACR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ACR files are created using ACRobot's built-in scripting language. However, they are recorded based on the user's actions and do not require any manual programming.

description: Script created with ACRobot (AutoCursorRobot), a program that creates scripts for mouse and keyboard actions; used for automating common tasks and speeding up repetitive jobs.
